name: schematically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows the basic details of something, usually in the form of a drawing: Those objectives can be arranged schematically. See
schematic
More examplesFewer examplesThe sequence of relationships are schematically illustrated in Fig. 9. This process is represented schematically in the following diagram. I can do no more than indicate schematically the main points which need further elaboration.The details of the removal process are shown schematically in Fig. 6.
